entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Forks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:35 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
